name: Puerto Vallarta City Tour
description: Just because your hotel is in Puerto Vallarta doesn´t mean you can´t explore the cities surrounding the heart of Vallarta. We invite to expand your trip by taking one of our marvelous city tours. You can choose to explore hidden virgin beaches south of Vallarta or head north to the numerous culturally rich cities above Vallarta. We have many city tours for you to choose from including day tours to multiple day tours. As always we offer 10% off your tour!
